name: Unreal Tournament SDK

screenshots.caption: 2 Tori, that have an Environment Map and Cellshade applied
Advanced Shadowing using Projective Textures (Fan Shadow)
A SparkEmitter whose Particles collide with the Hemisphere

short_description: The Extension Pack for UT99 is an SDK full of new features/tools improving the Unreal Engine 1 in a wide range. Besides tons of new visual features it improves physics, gameplay and AI, contains a new render (currently OpenGL only) and bundled tools.
